name: Shin Megami Tensei: Devil Children: Red Book
name_original: Shin Megami Tensei: Devil Children: Red Book
description:
Shin Megami Tensei: Devil Children: Red Book is an adventure-RPG game. It came out on 17-11-2000. It was published by Atlus.
You can play Shin Megami Tensei: Devil Children: Red Book on Game Boy Color and PlayStation.
